explains: adj. 贫困的；处于不利地位的；社会地位低下的
n. 弱势团体；不利条件
v. 使处于不利地位（disadvantage 的过去式和过去分词）
wordGroup: disadvantaged groups 弱势群体；劣势群体
disadvantaged children 不幸儿童；生活条件差的儿童

sentences.en: Children living in inner-city areas may be educationally disadvantaged.
sentences.cn: 居住在市中心贫民区的孩子在教育方面可能处于不利的地位。

sentences.en: The same is not certain when it comes to students from more disadvantaged backgrounds.
sentences.cn: 对于家庭背景更贫困的学生来说，情况就不一定了。

sentences.en: He hopes he will be an inspiration for other young people from disadvantaged backgrounds.
sentences.cn: 他希望自己能激励其他来自贫困家庭的年轻人。
